entry.source: {F812}Dignified voice\0{F87A,-168}{F813,1,413103}That is enough, Thor.{F801}{F802}That was a splendid battle, you two.{F801}I cannot recall when I last felt so{F801}impassioned from watching combat.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dignified voice\0{F87A,-168}{F813,1,413103}That is enough, Thor.{F801}{F802}That was a splendid battle, you two.{F801}I cannot recall when I last felt so{F801}impassioned from watching combat.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Thor\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,413202}That voice... Lord Odin!{F801}Your memories have returned!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Thor\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,413202}That voice... Lord Odin!{F801}Your memories have returned!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A dignified voice speaks out from{F801}behind the demon...{F801}
